dct_title_s: Map of the world on a globular projection
dct_description_sm: "Entered according to Act of Congress Nov. 20th 1829 by D. F. Robinson & Co. of the State of Connecticut." "Engd. by E. Huntington." Double hemispherical world map showing distances by sea from New York to various destinations, and dates of Antarctic explorations, including U.S. Exploring Expedition of 1840; relief shown by hachures. Insets: Meridians; Parallels; Circles; Zones -- Charts: Height of mountains in English miles above the level of the sea; A scale exhibiting the length of the longest days and nights, also the zones and climates.
dct_publisher_sm: [Hartford, Conn.] : D. F. Robinson & Co., [1840?], c1829.
